name: message_admin_default
value:
welcome to wordle admin

Use !wordle admin help to start.

name: message_admin_help
value: !wordle admin add <word> - add a new word
!wordle admin solve <groupId> - show the solution for a group

name: message_help
value: !wordle info - show a simple explanation about the game
!wordle score - show your score and your rank

name: message_info
value:
Guess the WORDLE in 6 tries.

Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word. Hit the enter button to submit.

After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.

The green letter means is in the word and in the correct spot.

The yellow letter means is in the word but in the wrong spot.

The Gray letter means is not in the word in any spot.

name: message_start
value: The game has been begin, start guess with five letter word

name: message_lose
value:
(n) Unfortunately, the game is over, and the word was: {solution}
Good luck next time.

name: message_history
value: (n) You have already entered this word "{guess}", try another word.

name: message_cancel_error
value: (n) There is no game to cancel.

name: message_refresh
value:
(y) The following groups have been updated: 
{groupsNames}.

name: message_win
value: (y) {nickname} ({id}) This is correct. And you got {score} points.

name: message_my_score
value:
Your rank and total points:

Rank: {GlobalRank}
Total: {score} points 
{nickname} ( {id} )

name: message_my_score_error
value:
You currently have no points in this bot
{nickname} ( {id} )

name: message_admin_add
value: (y) The word has been added successfully.

name: message_admin_add_error
value: (n) The word must be 5 letters long.

name: message_admin_delete
value: (y) The word has been successfully deleted.

name: message_admin_solve_error
value: (n) There is no game in this group.

value.msg: The bot has been successfully joined.
This group requires you to have earned a higher user level.
You've joined the maximum permitted number of groups.
This group no longer seems to exist.
It seems that you're banned from this group.
It looks like you're already in this group!
This group is restricted to new users.
Perhaps you've created too many accounts?
This group can only be joined from a game.

name: error_must_be_number
value: (n) The entry must be a number.
